prompts: Create a poison-type Pokemon with a sleek body and sharp spines.

Make a unique character design for a Pokemon with a playful personality.

Design a Pokemon that has a mix of icy and earthy colors.
Show me a powerful middle-evolution Pokemon that is known for its agility.
